headline: Genesis Cancer and Blood Institute and American Oncology Network Welcome Dr. Tyler Fugere
summary: Board-certified medical oncologist and hematologist joins physician teamHOT SPRINGS, Ark., Aug. 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Genesis Cancer and Blood Institute, a partner practice of American Oncology Network (AON), is pleased to welcome Board-certified physician Tyler Fugere, MD, to its physician care team. She joins an experienced group of physicians including Drs. Brad Baltz, Jim Chen, Timothy Webb, Robert Muldoon, Stephen “Fred” Divers, Lynn Cleveland, Lingyi Chen, Sunil Kakadia, and Kristen
